card_name: Maybank Manchester United Platinum Visa Card

key_features: 1% Unlimited Cashback and 1X TREATS Points on all transactions
Up to 3% Cashback and 5X TREATS points when Manchester United wins a Premier League match
First 2 years annual fee waived, enjoy subsequent waiver at a minimum spend of S$3,600 per year
overseas_spending: 5 TREATS Points for every $5 spend in local and/or foreign currency
Get complimentary travel insurance coverage of up to S$300,000
cash_back: 5 TREATS Points for every $5 spend in local and/or foreign currency
rewards: 5 TREATS Points for every $5 spend in local and/or foreign currency
TREATS Points will expire one year after the end of each quarter period in which they are earned
entertainment: Stand a chance to win a trip for two to watch Manchester United LIVE every football season
20% discount on Manchester United Stadium and Museum Tour tickets purchased at the Old Trafford Football Ground
10% discount on food and drinks at the Red Cafe, at Old Trafford
On the day Manchester United wins in the English Premier League matches: Additional 4X TREATS Points for every S$1 spent, Additional 2% Cashback (capped at S$20)
dining: 10% discount on food and drinks at the Red CafeÂ©, at Old Trafford
5 TREATS Points for every $5 spend in local and/or foreign currency
online_shopping: 10% discount at the United Direct Online Megastore
5 TREATS Points for every $5 spend in local and/or foreign currency

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Available with a minimum of S$3,600 spent
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher

minimum_income.non_singaporean: Non-Singaporean Minimum Income S$60000. Malaysia Citizens (in employment for at least 1 year): S$45,000
